name: Side Effects Demo
description:
A HHITGames Production

Side Effects is a highly story driven, pixel-art, puzzler with a light horror ambiance.

Assume the role of Barry Glason a rookie detective from the GPD.

interact with objects within the environment to reveal the story, and help Barry solve the case!

This software is currently in development.

It is free to download.

Feel free to stream, and review the demo on any of your preferred social media platforms.

and last, but not least.

Please consider donating...

Your donations help to keep this project alive!

Thanks for playing!!
